title: Using Images as Covariates: Measuring Curb Appeal with Deep Learning
abstract: arXiv:2403.19915v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: This paper details an innovative methodology to integrate image data into traditional econometric models. Motivated by forecasting sales prices for residential real estate, we harness the power of deep learning to add "information" contained in images as covariates. Specifically, images of homes were categorized and encoded using an ensemble of image classifiers (ResNet-50, VGG16, MobileNet, and Inception V3). Unique features presented within each image were further encoded through panoptic segmentation. Forecasts from a neural network trained on the encoded data results in improved out-of-sample predictive power. We also combine these image-based forecasts with standard hedonic real estate property and location characteristics, resulting in a unified dataset. translated_title: 使用图像作为协变量：利用深度学习测量房屋吸引力
translated_abstract: 本文详细介绍了一种创新的方法，将图像数据整合到传统计量经济模型中。受到为住宅房地产销售价格做预测的动机，我们利用深度学习的力量将图像中包含的“信息”作为协变量添加进去。具体地，房屋的图像通过一组图像分类器（ResNet-50、VGG16、MobileNet和Inception V3）进行分类和编码。每幅图像中呈现的独特特征通过全景分割进一步进行编码。通过对编码数据进行训练的神经网络的预测，提高了样本外预测能力。我们还将这些基于图像的预测与标准的平凡地产物业和位置特征结合起来，形成了一个统一的数据集。我们展示了当编码特征被视为额外的协变量时，基于图像的预测提高了平凡的预测准确性。我们还尝试“解释”哪些协变量
tldr: 本文介绍了一种新颖的方法，利用深度学习将图像数据作为协变量融入传统计量经济模型，提高了房屋价格预测的准确性。
en_tdlr: This paper presents an innovative approach to integrate image data as covariates into traditional econometric models using deep learning, improving the accuracy of residential real estate price forecasting.
